    • Constructor Detail

      • TextEditorWidget

        public TextEditorWidget()
        Text Editor widget constructor. Implements the text HTML and implements the mouse cursor change.

    • Method Detail

      • valuesNotAllowed

        public boolean valuesNotAllowed(int value)
        Function that returns true for characters not allowed and false for characters allowed for the text editor modifiers
        Parameters:
        value - Char value to check if is allowed or not
        Returns:
        True if value is not allowed and false if value is allowed

      • modifyTEIText

        public void modifyTEIText(java.lang.String innerHTML)
        Updates the text showing in the text editor
        Parameters:
        innerHTML - HTML to show in the text editor. It has to have the desired format.
